title: Trust & Safety, built-in
subtitle: Every villa is screened across legal, financial, and operational touchpoints before it ever appears on Villas.co.th.

items.title: Legal verification
items.description: Title deed, blue book, and company share review with licensed Thai lawyers.

items.title: Secure escrow
items.description: Funds stay in escrow with tier-1 banking partners until contracts are fully executed.

items.title: Quality control
items.description: On-site inspections with 200-point readiness checklist and digital twin documentation.

items.title: Data protection
items.description: SOC2-aligned storage, granular permissions, and privacy-by-design workflows.

note: Backed by Thai legal advisors and escrow partners; audited annually.
